thread.title: P D Wilson
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by P D Wilson

author: P D Wilson
title: P D Wilson
text:
How easy is this to get your tyres chosen, ordered, delivery day, and blow me they turn up when they say they will. Fantastic. The guy was very professional, fast, and cor all that equipment in the van. By the way, in this cold weather don't forget Make them a cuppa!! They deserve it.
Thank you so much.
